rules: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Blaine's Charmander in order to use this attack. If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.
You and your opponent remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon with damage counters on them.
